SEARCH
Package de.tinf.io

Enum Class ConsoleANSICode

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<ConsoleANSICode>
de.tinf.io.ConsoleANSICode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ConsoleANSICode>, Constable
public enum ConsoleANSICode extends Enum<ConsoleANSICode>
The ConsoleANSICode enum represents the ANSI escape codes for console text formatting and colors. Each enum constant represents a specific ANSI escape code.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

      Applies ANSI codes to the given text to change its appearance.
